title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 204.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 204.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to every issuer of debt (as defined
below) other than the State Comptroller. All requirements of this Part apply
immediately upon the effective date of this Part, except as otherwise consented
to by the State Comptroller upon timely request and for good cause shown. The
requirements of this Part shall only be satisfied by a submission in accordance
with section
204.7
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
204.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
